lessons.japanese: 事後に事を悟るのは容易だ。
lessons.indonesian: It is easy to be wise after the event.

lessons.japanese: 間違いを悟るのに彼はほんの数分かかっただけだ。
lessons.indonesian: It took him only a few minutes to realize his mistakes.

lessons.japanese: これで法律を守らなければならない事を悟るだろう。
lessons.indonesian: This will teach that he must obey the law.

lessons.japanese: いつかは君も貯蓄の重要さを悟るようになるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: Some day you will come to realize the importance of saving.

lessons.japanese: 少し考えれば君は自分が間違っていることを悟るだろう。
lessons.indonesian: A little reflection will make you realize you are wrong.
